title: Jennifer Arcuri refuses to answer whether she had an affair with Boris Johnson – video
text:
Jennifer Arcuri refused to answer whether she had an affair with Boris Johnson when he was mayor of London during an interview on ITV’s Good Morning Britain. Asked if she had an intimate relationship with Johnson, she said: 'I'm not going to be putting myself in a position for you to weaponise my answer. I'm being used as a pawn. This entire thing is a crazy charade.’

The US businesswoman was awarded more than £126,000 of public money and given a highly sought after entrepreneur visa to stay in the UK after securing the prime minister’s endorsement for her firm
description: Asked if she had an intimate relationship with Johnson, the US businesswoman said: 'I'm not going to be putting myself in a position for you to weaponise my answer'
